instructions:
Brown sausage pieces in oil in a 6 quart pot, remove and set aside. Then brown chicken pieces skin side
down first and turn. Remove chicken and set aside. Add onion and garlic to oil and cook 5 minutes. Add
and mix tomatoes, tomato sauce, vinegar and seasonings. Return chicken and sausage to the pot, cover and
simmer 35 to 45 minutes. Serve over favorite pasta.
ingredients: 1 lb sweet Italian sausage, cut in 8 pieces
3 lb chicken, cut up in 8 pieces
1 can (28 oz) crushed tomatoes in puree
name: Chicken With Sweet Italian Sausage
